title: Last Week's Top Stories - NASCAR'S Noose Investigation, COVID-19 Cases Spike & Trump's Tulsa Rally
itunes:title: Last Week's Top Stories - NASCAR'S Noose Investigation, COVID-19 Cases Spike & Trump's Tulsa Rally
description:
The FBI investigates a noose in NASCAR driver Bubba Wallace's garage, U.S. COVID-19 cases surge, Trump sees low turnout at his rally in Tulsa, OK, and Rhode Island updates its name.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
